betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The laughs, the madness, the euphoria; yet another one of the criminally masterful weapons of the Shyre Empire.
The torture, it seems, is a secondary reason for why Celeve is part of the Empire. 
The main motivation, though, is one of Gyro's creations. A volatile fluid that, even in small quantities, is potent enough to bring an entire planet into murderous clown madness. Even hearing the name of it is enough to induce a craze. Truly scary stuff.
Yet another world-ending weapon that could be unleashed on Terra if things with the Twilight Horde escalate further.
I really have to be thankful that the Dimensional Shard supply chain is so valuable and yet so fragile, and that both invaders are so powerful that they could annhilate each other; otherwise, the people of Terra would have been wiped out long ago...
